title: Skyvern
description:
Skyvern is an open source no-code web agent builder that helps you build AI agents that can browse the web and take actions. Skyvern's agents score a state-of-the-art 85.8% on the WebVoyager benchmark. 

Companies currently use Skyvern to automate things like:
1. Job applications 
2. Automated Invoice retrieval 
3. Filling contact forms for multi-channel outreach
4. Purchasing
5. IT onboarding / offboarding workflows
6. Filling out government forms
